entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 15. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 05 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Light snow. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Light snow beginning in the morning. Amount 2 cm. Wind east 20 km/h. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 23 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 05 March 2023
